mapper.select: SELECT O.id as id, O.name as name, O.address as address, O.phone as phone, O.time as time, O.id as order_id, I.product_id as product_id, I.quantity as quantity, I.quantity * P.price as amount FROM order_items I INNER JOIN orders O ON I.order_id = O.id INNER JOIN products P ON I.product_id = P.id WHERE I.order_id = #{id}
